item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“mortal4combat, post:11, topic:549731”]one more help please, toggle pray command.
thank’s[/quote]
Look at the code in the link I gave you…

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:549731”]I’m not very familiar with how 718 works. I can only give you bits and pieces. I don’t work with it, and don’t have a server for reference.

I believe something like this would work…

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("lunars")) { player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You switch to the lunar spell book"); player.getCombatDefinitions().setSpellBook(2); }

Note: I used [size=18pt]this code[/size] as a reference.
I don’t have a 718 server, and don’t use them. So.[/quote]

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I’m not very familiar with how 718 works. I can only give you bits and pieces. I don’t work with it, and don’t have a server for reference.

I believe something like this would work…

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("lunars")) { player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You switch to the lunar spell book"); player.getCombatDefinitions().setSpellBook(2); }

Note: I used this code as a reference.
I don’t have a 718 server, and don’t use them. So.

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @mortal4combat mortal4combat
item.description:
@mortal4combat wrote:

Got it!!

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { if (cmd.length < 2) { for (int skill = 0; skill < 25; skill++) player.getSkills().addXp(skill, Skills.MAXIMUM_EXP); return true; } try { player.getSkills().addXp(Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]), Skills.MAXIMUM_EXP); } catch (NumberFormatException e) { player.getPackets().sendPanelBoxMessage( "Use: ::master skill"); } return true; }
[size=14pt] Thank's very much!, but now, can you help me resolve other problem?, i want to add lunars book command. what is it and where to add. Thank's[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

mortal4combat:

i understood, i have changed the command place in cmd, and only the Attack level arrived to max, Please explain more, thank’s.

You changed what?

The command is made so if you type ::master
it’ll give you all skills maxed
but if you type ::master 1
it’d give you max in the skill with an id of 1.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Your edit would only cause errors.

Here is your code… Explained. Sorta.
I commented what each part essentially does.

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("master")) {// Checks to see if the first item in the cmd array is equal to master, ignoring capitalization if (cmd.length < 2) {// Checks if the cmd array is less than 2. for (int skill = 0; skill < 25; skill++)// If less than 2, loop from 0 to 25. player.getSkills().addXp(skill, Skills.MAXIMUM_EXP);// Add max exp to each skill ID in the loop. return true;// Returns that the command executed. } try {// Try block start player.getSkills().addXp(Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]), Skills.MAXIMUM_EXP);// Attempts to parse the second value in the cmd array as an integer. If successful, it will add max exp to that skill. } catch (NumberFormatException e) {// Catches bad number formatting errors. I.E: trying to turn "A" into an Integer. player.getPackets().sendPanelBoxMessage("Use: ::master skill");// Tells the user } return true;// Returns true because command executed properly. }

You need to modify another part of the code, or probably move the command to another method…

Read full topic

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @mortal4combat mortal4combat
item.description:
@mortal4combat wrote:

hello. i have zenith scape, in this game, the owner only who able to use ::master command, i tried to make it for all but didn’t success Here is the original command, commands.java

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { if (cmd.length < 2) { for (int skill = 0; skill < 25; skill++) player.getSkills().addXp(skill, Skills.MAXIMUM_EXP); return true; } try { player.getSkills().addXp(Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]), Skills.MAXIMUM_EXP); } catch (NumberFormatException e) { player.getPackets().sendPanelBoxMessage("Use: ::master skill"); } return true; }

and here is my Edit, (im not sure that i work in the right place)

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { 
				for (int skill = 0; skill < 25; skill++)
					player.getSkills().addXp(skill, Skills.MAXIMUM_EXP);
				return true;
			}
			try {
				player.getSkills().addXp(Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]),
						Skills.MAXIMUM_EXP);
			} catch (NumberFormatException e) {
				player.getPackets().sendPanelBoxMessage("Use: ::master skill");
			}
			return true;
		}</blockquote>

Read full topic
